website_summaries.verdict: Often used in cosmetology schools because it's easy to use and affordable for a top-of-the-line product.
pros: Everything you need is included in the kit, including wax removal oil
Earned bonus points for instructional materials
cons: Some complain the wax included in the kit is too sticky, but you can purchase other wax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great waxing system. I’m a pro and this is my favorite wax. Very gentle to all skin types
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Vanderhoef

customer_reviews.title: Being a professional esthetician I love it. Some people will find that they might ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a professional esthetician I love it. Some people will find that they might need the double wax pot but I use a nice expensive wax for the whole body so I'm great with single. I love the fact that it has a little cover on On/off button (great protection from wax drips) and that the dial has numbers which is a wonderful plus if ur a professional!
customer_reviews.author: 8petitebeauti8

customer_reviews.title: This.Is.The Bomb.
customer_reviews.text: Love,Love,Love! Quality products, well worth the money. The cream wax was new to me, but I prefer it to standard wax now! The waxing strips a very good quality, and the wax remover solution works well. You'll LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love this product it’s my favorite and the shipping is great, i am very satisfied and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: jenissa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I recieved everything and the products are great it even came early.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Carefully of where you store this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 4 months ago and was quite satisfied with it until this last time. I stored the product as always but it when I went to open it for use the next time the wax had leaked all over everything. I was very disappointed to learn they have no warranty on this product. The item was stored flat and in my bedroom so I don't feel it got to hot for the wax. Just be careful where and how you store this product. Other than that it seemed to work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Dagastine

customer_reviews.title: good product but items were missing upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: when I got my order there was a wax warmer only. The other stuff were missing. I was upset but I contacted the seller and they shipped out the missing items immediately. The products are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Some of the stuff in the kit is missing
customer_reviews.text: When I got the product, I was fairly happy. Delivery was pretty quick considering that I live in Hawaii. When I open the kit, I realized that protective collars were not in the kit. I do not know why it came without the protective collars. I want an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Min K. Yong

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Stuff melted everywhere in the summer, hard to get off of anything. Works ok and comes with a lot of stuff but the packaging sucks. I had wax stuck to everything, had to take it all out and repackage what I could salvage into zip lock bags. I lost alot of strips. and most of my wax. Other than that it works good. Dont order in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: keligrl36

customer_reviews.title: This was not easy to use or clean
customer_reviews.text: This was not easy to use or clean. It could be because I did not have any experience with self waxing, but I tossed this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't spill wax, or else...!
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was traveling with it opened the wax heated up due to sunny afternoon and spilled onto backseat. The wax is like warm fresh bubblegum and impossible to get off. The pink dye does not come out even though the Satin Release was used
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The wax need more time to warm
customer_reviews.text: The wax took much longer than recommended to warm properly. We have used it just once. I look forward to using it again when we have enough time to warm the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: I saved a lot of money on waxing as I don't need to go to the salon, I do it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Bough it or my daughter as a gift and she loves it. Says it is just like going to a salon and spending a fortune for waxing. Do it yourself at a fraction of the cost....
customer_reviews.author: beatngu2

customer_reviews.title: HOT WAX MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. No more running to the salon. And, it's so easy to use!! It's perfect for brows and lips!
customer_reviews.author: LOVE IT!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Warmer does not warm at all
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product get to me at a later time than it said it would, but now that I finally have time and decided to use it, it's not even warming up the wax AT ALL and it has been on for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Not Waxed

customer_reviews.title: What’s in the box?
customer_reviews.text: Pictured is what came in the box. Not exactly as shown and described. It didn’t come with a dvd (Thankfully I have a friend who is a licensed esthetician, there is always YouTube also) and there were only two of the disc liners. The package sat outside in the cold so I am going to give it some time to warm up before I plug it in to use it. I will add more to my review once I have a good idea of how the product works.
customer_reviews.author: R. Every

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit to get started with waxing, but know that you'll definitely need to go out and buy more supplies VERY soon, most specifically applicators. Other kits come with many more, but aside from that this kit is great. The temperature adjustment settings are very useful and the wax goes on nice and smooth. The strips are a nice quality of cloth and the products all work well. Overall, it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars b/c it's a little expensive for what you get. Loved this set! You don't really need all of the ointments, I just use coconut oil to remove wax/condition and sulfur ointment to prevent in grown hairs, but the wax and heater always worked great for me :) I somehow lost it and now I use microwavable wax from whole foods, wax strips I buy for like $2 on ebay for a ton, and this has lasted me about a year for just bikini and brazilian.
customer_reviews.author: o2ange

customer_reviews.title: Used multiple times and love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use, I am a first time waxer and was very hesitant about purchasing the product but this has turned out to be a good purchase. The DVD showed how to wax the different areas and I thought it was sufficient for teaching. The only thing I found difficult was keeping the wax in one place and not getting drips on anything since it's hard (not impossible) to get the wax out.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Uni_Brow no more
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is learning the Cosmotology trade and she absolutley loves this waxing kit. It is a little slow in warming up but no big deal. She loves how well it works and how it is much easier than melting the wax in the microwave, too hot? oh sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Proper

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: great for the price and everything you get in it. yea i did need to get some more strips and sticks but other than that it works great. but for different types of hair and skin you may need to buy different wax. but the warmer warms up pretty fast and isnt to big, so its great for at home
customer_reviews.author: Desi dallmann

customer_reviews.title: Salon Quality
customer_reviews.text: This kit works no different than what service you'd get from a salon. If youve never been waxed before, then you cant honestly rate this against anything. If youre a regular "waxee" and you dont have skin reactions to it then this is the kit you want. It completely provides everything you'd need from a salon type waxing session. All the chemicals worked great and I had no problems. I recommend this kit for anyone who it tired of paying salon prices.
customer_reviews.author: BLUJKTS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: The kit is exactly as it was described with all of the various parts. To start with, I watched the video and appreciated the written instructions. Lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The wax warms up pretty quick. The sticks and the strips are not enough. So far no negatives for me when it comes to using this kit. Once my skin has been waxed, it's really soft.
customer_reviews.author: cheka20

customer_reviews.title: Very practical to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It is easy to deal with. It completely provides everything you'd need from a salon type waxing session. All the chemicals worked great and I had no problems. I recommend this kit for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's expensive to buy your own kit but in the long run it's definitely worth it! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works great after you learn how to do it yourself. My niece loved it. She would use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Guiding Angel

customer_reviews.title: wrong warmer
customer_reviews.text: I got everything but a different warmer so I'm unhappy with the warmer but am choosing to keep it because I need it for my salon and don't want to deal with the hassle of shipping it back!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Includes a step by step instruction CD in several languages. Easy to understand too! Great for school and people studying to be a wax tech.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It was great until it overflowed randomly!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this kit and used it often. One day I used it like normal and put it away in my closet. The next time I got it out, the wax had overflown and was everywhere. It was a terrible mess and I ended up throwing it away after that unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Moggz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use these professionally in a spa setting and absolutely love Satin Smooth products. The pink cream wax is awesome for all skin types & is affordable. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But Not What I Ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but did NOT get this model with the handle and cord wrap base which I wanted. I instead got the one that is squat and round with no handle & no place to wrap cord. Such a bummer. Also the lid does not lock onto the one I received. I'm sad I didn't get the one I wanted. Will rate performance after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA COOPER

customer_reviews.title: bought for home waxing
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use at home for waxing, going to the beauty shop is a pain. Used it for first time tonight. Plugged it in and warmed up about 45 minutes and was ready. I think I will like it.
customer_reviews.author: MadMarv

product_meta.title: Satin Smooth Single Wax Warmer Kit
product_meta.description: This all-inclusive kit lets you offer clients professional, customized waxing treatments, our single wax warmer holds most standard 14 ounce and 16 ounce cans of wax. We've included the new deluxe series wax warmer, skin prep and after care products, plus plenty of applicators, cloth waxing strips, and an instructional DVD.
feature_bullets: Ensures that each and every client enjoys a professional waxing experience
Includes skin prep and after care products
Plenty of applicators, cloth waxing strips and instructional DVD
